title: $g/u(1)^d$ parafermions from constrained WZNW theories
abstract: The conformal field theory based on the $g/u(1)^d$ coset construction is treated as the WZNW theory for the affine Lie algebra $\hat g$ with the constrained $\hat u(1)^d$ subalgebra.Using a modification of the generalized canonical quantization method generators and primary fields of an extended symmetry algebra are found for arbitrary d.
